ANU.name: Glenda Bloomfield
expertise: Humanities And Social Sciences Curriculum And Pedagogy Excl. Economics Business And Management
Legal Practice Lawyering And The Legal Profession
Property Law Excl. Intellectual Property Law
interest: Succession LawElder LawLaw and LiteratureHistory and Philosophy of LawLegal Education
ANU.biography: Glenda is an experienced practitioner in both New South Wales and Australian Capital Territory jurisdictions. She has worked in both the Government and the private sector for many years. Glenda has taught at the University of Canberra, in the Legal Workshop in various capacities in Wills, Probate and other areas since 1987, and teaches undergraduate Succession.
